Colors Utilities Classes

In sparkUI we have utilities classes to colorize text, background, fill and stroke of svgs utilities classes formulas are:

Class Usage
u-color-[COLOR_NAME] set current container font color to the selected color
u-bg-[COLOR_NAME] set current container background color to the selected color
u-fill-[COLOR_NAME] set current svg fill color to the selected color
u-stroke-[COLOR_NAME] set current svg stroke color to the selected color

You can find a list of all SprakUI Colors

we also have 4 special case colors for svg fill and stroke to apply the current parent color u-stroke-current-color and u-fill-current-color or to remove the color of strock or fill u-fill-none and u-stroke-none
